list.abs: the neuronal ceroid lipofuscinoses ( NCLs ) are progressive , fatal neurodegenerative disorders of unknown pathogenesis with onset ranging from infancy to adulthood .神经元蜡样脂褐质沉积症（NCL)是一些进行性致命的神经变性紊乱，其病原机理未知，发病年龄从婴儿期到成年期不等。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin infantia 'childhood, inability to speak', from infans, infant- (see infant)

entry.def: Infancy is the period of your life when you are a very young child.

example.tran: 德博拉幼年生活的详尽细节

example.ex: ...the development of the mind from infancy onwards.
example.tran: 从婴儿期开始的心智发展

entry.def: If something is in its infancy, it is new and has not developed very much.

example.ex: Computing science was still in its infancy.
example.tran: 计算科学仍然处于初期阶段。

means.word_mean: 1. the early stage of growth or development

Sentence.sentence: Experts see a movement toward the use of mobile technology in education, though they say it is in its infancy as professors try to come up with useful applications.

sentences.en: He came to England in his infancy.
Their research is only in its infancy.
sentences.cn: 他们的研究处于初级阶段。
